title: Bloodlock [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Blue Tongue Films, Joel Edgerton, Tony Lynch, Kieran Darcy-Smith and Nash Edgerton
brief_description: A male dominated family try to break free from a crime syndicate. The bonds of blood are strong, as father and feuding son rally around Danny and his debt of $2,000, as everyone is drawn into the maelstrom, but at what cost? A tautly scripted piece about family and the inescapabilility of violence that pulls a punch as it winds to a frightening conclusion. Cast includes Amanda Crompton, Joel Edgerton and Simon Lyndon.
